io.craigmiller160.school.controller

Class AdminCourseController

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.craigmiller160.school.controller.AdminCourseController

  • @Controller
 @RequestMapping(value="/admin/course")
public class AdminCourseController
extends java.lang.Object
    The controller handling all interactions with registered courses. It primary facilitates performing CRUD operations with Course entities.

    THREAD SAFETY: Because this controller will be used in a servlet environment, it is designed to be completely thread safe.

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    craig

    • Constructor Detail

      • AdminCourseController

        @Autowired(required=true)
public AdminCourseController(GenericEntityServiceBean service)
        Create this controller and inject a reference to this program's service layer as well. If the service class is passed as null, this controller will fail in its operations.
        Parameters:
        service - the class representing this program's service layer.

    • Method Detail

      • getAllCourses

        @RequestMapping(value="/all",
                method=GET)
public java.lang.String getAllCourses(org.springframework.ui.Model model,
                                                                                                @RequestParam
                                                                                                int page)
        Retrieve a paginated list of all courses persisted in the database. The page retrieved is defined by the "page" HTTP request parameter.
        Parameters:
        model - the model for the courses page to populate with a list of courses.
        page - the page number to retrieve courses for.
        Returns:
        the name of of the UI page to display the list of courses on.

      • createNewCourse

        @RequestMapping(value="/new",
                method=GET)
public java.lang.String createNewCourse(Course course)
        Open a blank form for defining the attributes of a Course object in preparation for creating a new entity.
        Parameters:
        course - the course to populate with values in the UI.
        Returns:
        the name of the UI page containing the form to display.

      • insertCourse

        @RequestMapping(value="/new",
                method=PUT)
public java.lang.String insertCourse(Course course)
        Insert a newly created Course entity into the database, using the service layer.
        Parameters:
        course - the course to insert.
        Returns:
        a redirect to the first page of the courses list UI page.
        Throws:
        java.lang.RuntimeException - a subclass of RuntimeException is thrown if the persistence operation fails.

      • editCourse

        @RequestMapping(value="/{courseId}",
                method=GET)
public java.lang.String editCourse(org.springframework.ui.Model model,
                                                                                                    Course course,
                                                                                                    @PathVariable(value="courseId")
                                                                                                    java.lang.String courseId)
        Open a form for defining the attributes of a Course entity with its fields already populated with the attributes of the selected course. Allows for those attributes to be edited by the user.
        Parameters:
        model - the model defining values for the page.
        course - the course whose values will populate the fields of the form.
        courseId - the ID of the course whose values will populate the fields of the form.
        Returns:
        the name of the UI page containing the form to display.
        Throws:
        java.lang.RuntimeException - a subclass of RuntimeException is thrown if the persistence operation fails.

      • updateCourse

        @RequestMapping(value="/{courseId}",
                method=POST)
public java.lang.String updateCourse(Course course,
                                                                                                       org.springframework.ui.Model model,
                                                                                                       @PathVariable(value="courseId")
                                                                                                       java.lang.String courseId,
                                                                                                       @RequestParam(required=false)
                                                                                                       java.lang.String cancel)
        Update the values of an edited course in the database. Only performs the operation if the "cancel" HTTP request parameter is null.
        Parameters:
        course - the course whose values are to be updated.
        model - the model defining values for the page.
        courseId - the ID of the course whose values are to be updated.
        cancel - an HTTP request parameter that needs to be null for the update operation to be performed.
        Returns:
        a redirect to the first page of the courses list UI page.
        Throws:
        java.lang.RuntimeException - a subclass of RuntimeException is thrown if the persistence operation fails.

      • deleteCourse

        @RequestMapping(value="/{courseId}",
                method=DELETE)
public java.lang.String deleteCourse(@PathVariable(value="courseId")
                                                                                                         java.lang.String courseId)
        Delete a specified course from the database.
        Parameters:
        courseId - the ID of the course to be deleted.
        Returns:
        a redirect to the first page of the courses list UI page.
        Throws:
        java.lang.RuntimeException - a subclass of RuntimeException is thrown if the persistence operation fails.
